api.body:
require "pixcHelper"
require "pixcNetwork"
if self.helper ~= nil then -- already init called
	return 
end

self.helper = createPixcHelper(pixc,self())
self.network = createPixcNetwork()
self.connected = false

self.IsConnected(false)

self.ip = self.helper:getProperty("IP","127.0.0.1")
self.port = tonumber(self.helper:getProperty("Port","51234"))

self.network:configureTcp(
	self.ip,
	self.port,
	function (handle, data) self().receive(data) end,
	function(handle, error) pixc.log("closeCallback: "..error) end)
self.network:setStatusCallbacks(
	function (...) pixc.log(...) end,
	function(isConnected) self().IsConnected(isConnected, true) end)
self.network:start()
api.name: init

api.body:
if self.network == nil then return end
self.network:close()
self.network = nil
self.helper = nil
self.IsConnected(false)
api.name: uninit

api.body:
if result == true then
pixc.report("connected")
else
pixc.report("disconnected")
self.receive("")
end
api.name: IsConnected

elems.body:
if self.network == nil then return end
if deviceID == nil then return end
if Page == nil then return end

local page = math.floor(tonumber(Page))

self.network:send("PAGE-SET " .. page .. " " .. deviceID .. "\r\n")
elems.name: PageSet

if Page == nil or Bank == nil then return end

local page = math.floor(math.abs(tonumber(Page)))
local bank = math.floor(math.abs(tonumber(Bank)))

self.network:send("BANK-PRESS " .. page .. " " .. bank .. "\r\n")
elems.name: Press

elems.body:
if self.network == nil then return end
if Page == nil or Bank == nil or text == nil then
	return
end

local page = math.floor(math.abs(tonumber(Page)))
local bank = math.floor(math.abs(tonumber(Bank)))

self.network:send("STYLE BANK " .. page .. " " .. bank .. " TEXT " .. text .."\r\n")
elems.name: SetText

self.network:send("STYLE BANK " .. page .. " " .. bank .. " COLOR " .. hex .."\r\n")

api.body:
if self.network == nil then return end
if name == nil then	return end
if value == nil then value = "" end

self.network:send("CUSTOM-VARIABLE " .. name .. "SET-VALUE " .. value .. "\r\n")
api.name: setCustomVariable
